short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Updates user profiles with more information.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Made by Alex Craig of the Codecademy Moderator team. Updates CC User Profiles to include 'Points Today' and 'Best Streak', which were removed in the latest Codecademy UI update. See more about the code behind this on GitHub at https://github.com/A-J-C/CodecademyUpdates/blob/master/Code/ProfileUpdater.md
